REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Function oDoc AS Object oDoc=thiscomponent End Function
Function oForm_Personaldaten AS Object oForm_Personaldaten=oForm_Steuerung.getByName("Form_Personaldaten") End Function
Function oForm_Steuerung AS Object oForm_Steuerung=oDoc.DrawPage.Forms.getByName("Form_Steuerung") End Function
Function oField_PersonalID AS Object oField_PersonalID=oForm_Personaldaten.getByName("Field_PersonalID") End Function
Function oField_Name_1 AS Object oField_Name_1=oForm_Personaldaten.getByName("Field_Name_1") End Function
Function oField_Stunden_Satz AS Object oField_Stunden_Satz=oForm_Personaldaten.getByName("Field_Stunden_Satz") End Function
Function oList_Personalauswahl AS Object oList_Personalauswahl=oForm_Steuerung.getByName("List_Personalauswahl") End Function
Function lPersonalID AS long lPersonalID=CLng(oField_PersonalID.Value) End Function
Function fName1 AS String fName1=oField_Name_1.BoundField.string End Function
Function lPersonalID_import AS long sSQL1="SELECT Max(PersonalID) FROM "& sPersonal oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() lPersonalID_import=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function fAnzahlDatensaetzePersonal AS integer Dim oRecord1 AS Object Dim sSQL1 AS String sSQL1="SELECT count(*) FROM "& sPersonal &" WHERE PersonalID="& lPersonalID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fAnzahlDatensaetzePersonal=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function GetDocUserProperty(sPropertyName AS String) AS String Dim oUserProps AS Object ' On Error Resume Next oUserProps = oDoc.DocumentProperties.getUserDefinedProperties() if oUserProps.getPropertySetInfo().hasPropertyByName(sPropertyName) = True then GetDocUserProperty = oUserProps.getPropertyValue(sPropertyName) else GetDocUserProperty = "" end if End Function
